mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(max(fileGroupNum), 0) FROM fileGroup WHERE flag = #{flag}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fileGroup (fileGroupNum, flag) VALUES((SELECT IFNULL(max(f.fileGroupNum),0)+1 FROM files f), #{flag})
mapper.update: UPDATE fileGroup SET cb_num = #{cb_num} WHERE fileGroupNum = #{fileGroupNum}
UPDATE fileGroup SET fb_num = #{fb_num} WHERE fileGroupNum = #{fileGroupNum}
UPDATE fileGroup SET flag = '-1' WHERE flag = #{flag}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(max(file_num),0) from files WHERE fileName = #{fileName} and fileHash = #{fileHash} and fileGroupNum = #{fileGroupNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO files (fileGroupNum, file_num, filePath, fileName, fileSize, fileHash, regDate) VALUES(#{fileGroupNum}, (SELECT IFNULL(max(f.file_num),0)+1 FROM files f), #{filePath}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileHash}, #{regDate})
